title: The Beginning of Life: The Series
overview: The early years are the ones that structure the life of a person. The Beginning of Life: The Series follows the success movement of the movie, shedding light into Early Childhood Development in 6 episodes with never-seen footage from all over the globe, portraying new discoveries and moving stories. Among the themes discussed are the process of becoming a parent, children that had their childhood denied and the importance of involving the whole society in raising a child.
